title: Competition: Born Gold Vinyl Giveaway w/ Crash Symbols
body:
When [**Born Gold**](http://www.facebook.com/borngoldofficial) hooked up with [**Crash Symbols**](http://crashsymbols.tumblr.com/) to produce the wonderfully frenetic **_Bodysongs,_** it was always going to be a match made in psychedelic heaven. One of the slickest labels around combining with the most exciting act to come out of that part of the world in recent years; you couldn’t really ask for much more. With rave reviews across the board, **Born Gold’s** infectious brand of quirky electro-indie is spreading like wildfire. To celebrate the release of _**Bodysongs**_, our good friends over at **Crash Symbols** have kindly offered us a copy of the album on gorgeous 12″ vinyl to give away to one lucky fan. To enter, simply make sure that you are a fan of [**Crash Symbols**](http://www.facebook.com/crashsymbols) and [**Crack in the Road**](http://www.facebook.com/crackintheroad) on Facebook, then leave a comment below (either in the Facebook comment box or the general box), telling us what your favourite track from _**Bodysongs**_ is!

Check out a couple of personal favourites below, and head over to the **Crash Symbols** [bandcamp](http://crashsymbols.bandcamp.com/album/bodysongs) to get _**Bodysongs**_ in digital or vinyl format.

The competition will close on the **Wednesday 18 October** at **22:00** GMT, and the winner will be picked randomly and notified via Facebook. Postage will be covered, and the competition is open to residents of any country!
